type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch
type.summary: Represents a class, which manages the settings of the control .

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.TrackSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the width of the switch in the control .
property.value: Width of the switch. The default value is 48px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.GetTrackSize(Elysium.Controls.ToggleSwitch)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.SetTrackSize(Elysium.Controls.ToggleSwitch,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.ThumbThickness
property.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the switch in the control .
property.value: Thickness of the switch. The default value is 10 px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.GetThumbThickness(Elysium.Controls.ToggleSwitch)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ToggleSwitch.SetThumbThickness(Elysium.Controls.ToggleSwitch,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
